title: Anticancer efficacy of dual-loaded SLNs with Doxorubicin (DOX) and Pterostilbene (PTS): formulation, characterization, and evaluation for breast cancer.
abstract: This study aimed to develop optimized doxorubicin (DOX) and pterostilbene (PTS) co-loaded solid lipid nanoparticles (SLNs) for synergistic triple-negative breast cancer (TNBC) therapy, enhancing drug stability, tumor targeting, and therapeutic efficacy.
